titleStmt.title: Hymns to Mary, Taʾammǝra Māryām, Māḫleta ṣǝge

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

binding.decoNote: The manuscript seems to have been rebound by the library.

history.provenance: The manuscript had very probably belonged to a church in the area, from where it was taken by and brought to . It was then looted by the British Napier expedition in 1868.

item.desc: The name of is mentioned in the supplications of and . Though states that this is the writer, this is not indicated in the manuscript.

decoNote.desc: How the angels show Mary the fire of hell.
How Mary suffered and prayed after being shown hell.
